The doctor doesn't know what is wrong with Ethan, but it is good that they got him to the hospital when he did considering how high his temperature was. Lily arrives furious and alarmed. Paul tries to explain what he did, but Lily doesn't want to hear it. Ethan is sick because of him, but then as she watches her ill baby through the window, she worries about how she missed what was wrong with him. Maddie and Will show up to pick up Gwen and head out of town because Jade knows. They are shocked when Iris walks out at Gwen's side. She and Gwen have been chatting and she has some questions, so their road trip may need to be delayed.
